website_summaries.verdict: This favorite among beauty bloggers is great for all skin types and can do wonders for acne-prone skin, scars, and uneven skin tone.
pros: The formula is fragrance-free absorbs quickly, and really moisturizes
It also dramatically reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
cons: The texture is a bit "slimy" compared to other snail repair creams

customer_reviews.title: Authentic product
customer_reviews.text: Very slimy cream...but it’s not heavy enough for my very dry skin. I hesitated to use it because a lot of reviews were saying that the new type of packaging is fake. It’s NOT fake. I think they just change the packaging. I emailed the cosrx website and they confirm the product is authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: New Holy Grail!!!
customer_reviews.text: New convert to snail mucin moisturizers. Only used this for 2wks, along with the CosRx 96 Snail Power Essence (*+my Glycolic acid cleanser, glycolic acid toner & Vitamin C serum). My face LOOOOOOVES this stuff. My once oily, sensitive, acne/PIH-prone almost 40yo skin is so soft, smooth & rapidly brightening & evening in tone & clarity. This cream & the CosRx snail essence are new holy grail products for me (*again, as part of an effective daily regimen). STRONGLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my face is super dry or something cuz it did not work as ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a few weeks now. I have dry sensitive skin. I bought this in hopes it would brighten my acne scars and double up as a moisturizer. Maybe my face is super dry or something cuz it did not work as a moisturizer. It seems like I need a more thicker consistency. There hasn't been a difference in my acne scars. Update: This product still does not work as a moisturizer for me but after a few more weeks, I've noticed that my acne scars have faded a little. However, it's sticky after applying and you have to wait a minute or two for that feel to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing if used right
customer_reviews.text: Straight off the bat, this moisturizer is NOT hydrating. For those with dry skin, you will need another moisturizer or cream before applying this. My skin type is dry, but the texture of the cream (the elasticity) forms such a nice final step as a protectant/seal for all my previous essences, serums, treatments, and hydrators. I mix a nickel size with a few drops of any facial oil and work it into my skin. The combination leaves my skin feeling so protected and dewy! Snail mucin is also known for having healing properties. This is SO great for sensitive skin. Personally, I think this is so much better than the snail essence. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mingxiangli

customer_reviews.title: Messy but kind to sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I found there are pros and cons to this product. Pros - very kind to sensitive skin. There is no stinging or irritation. This is calming and soft on the skin. - no scent - a little goes a long way - light feeling on this skin. Good for layering and great for hot and humid climates . Cons - this is messy - when you scoop out a drop you get a long string of product. - this is a good every day moisturizer but it is not up to healing with very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for normal & dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I feel like every woman should have this product. This is very hydrating specially for dry and normal skin. Is very affordable and a little goes along way. It will last a long time. My aunt and her daughter loved it so much that they kept taking it from each other. They kept asking where did I get such a great product. I ended up getting one for her daughter and one for me. Unfortunately my skin is oily therefore I only use this at night time.
customer_reviews.author: Yissel

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. I. LOVE. THIS.
customer_reviews.text: No scent, good for sensitive skin, AND it moisturizes?? YES. I absolutely love this. It’s perfect for over night, I would not use this as my morning moisturizer though. I did not feel like I got the same effect during the day. I slap on a good layer at night and would wake up with most of my redness gone. This has also helped brighten my skin. I have semi-sensitive acne prone combo skin if anyone was wondering. My only complaint is that the moisturizer does not feel pleasant. It's mostly snail mucin and it certainly feels like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: It is super slimy but is absorbs well on the skin
customer_reviews.text: This product took a bit of getting used to. It is super slimy but is absorbs well on the skin. I don't think it's enough of a moisturizer by itself though especially if you have dry skin. I have combination skin and I feel like my skin is moisturized when I go to bed but a little dry when I wake up in the morning. I recommend maybe adding an emulsion/light lotion before this product. I'm currently trying out the cosrx oil-free ultra moisturizing lotion before using this to see if it works out better. Overall, this product is good and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Burns your eyes!
customer_reviews.text: No. I did not apply in my eyes only on my face but by the end of the day my eyes were burning so much that I couldn’t open them. It was terrible! Sure enough after I washed my face and eyes, the burning subsided. I can’t believe how much this liquidity cream burned! I agree with the other reviewers that said it leaves your face tight and dry. Don’t purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, affordable cream!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this moisturizer! I have already been using the infamous Cosrx Snail Mucin Essence and their Honey Ceramide eye cream for a couple of months now and have been VERY pleased with both. I ran out of another brand of advanced snail cream so I decided to try this and couldn't be more pleased! It is so hydrating and refreshing to my very dry, thirsty skin. There's virtually no smell, non greasy, a small amount goes a long way, great price for the quality and amount you get, leaves your skin feeling soft, supple and smooth! Highly recommend...and if you have dry skin like I do, you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I love this so much. It has a similar consistency to snail mucin(super stretchy). I feel like this is a lightweight moisturizer that’s good for any skin type. When my skin was really dry, this kind of make my skin soft again. I have an acne prone skin and this doesn’t cause me any more breakout. Plus I feel like it helps fading my acne hyperpigmentation. This doesn’t contain any scent and little goes a long way. I feel like this is going to last me for a while.
customer_reviews.author: peachjaee

customer_reviews.title: And I loved that CosRx had one of the most humane ways ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on rave reviews for snail cream in general. And I loved that CosRx had one of the most humane ways of collecting the slime - I think they just let the snails live - no shocks or negative stimuli to motivate them to move. Although it feels super slimy, it absorbs well and I think it helps my skin to heal when I've over exfoliated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: The hype is real.
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly shocked with how great this cream is. I noticed a difference with my skin softness with the first day of use. It doesn’t have a scent. It soaks into skin effortlessly with no oily residue. I have oily skin and this moisturizer keeps my skin from being crazy oily while keeping my skin glowy. 10/10 definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GlitterTrash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, clean fragrance fee firm feel
customer_reviews.text: Love it all around. I use it daily. It absorbs easily, and keeps my face firm and flake free. My girlfriend also uses it and she has very sensitive skin. It has a slimy texture and looks first, however, this is offset by the rapid absorption and clean, fragrance free firm feel that remains. Definitely recommend, despite the price point. Although this I feel is offset as well by the small amount I use. A little goes a long way, lasts months.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, a solid no for me
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I was not expecting thistl be so bad. I have dry skin, and it has been normalizing over the last year. I bought this product with no expectations. It sucks out ALL the moisture out of my skin. Doesn’t matter if I majorly hydrate before this product goes on my face, or if I use an emollient sunscreen over top. In 20 minutes, my face feels so tight and dry it’s as if I didn’t apply anything. Once I find a small box this product is getting returned Edit: Aaaand can’t return it. Yup, it’s getting tossed then
customer_reviews.author: ad987654

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life
customer_reviews.text: I just started to invest more into my skincare because I was fed up with how my skin was looking especially with wearing masks everyday for work. I have extremely oily to combination skin. I put this on my face every night before bed and this is the only moisturizing face cream that does not have my face looking like a bucket of chicken when I wake up. My face is not dry or oily but supple and soft. I’m going to keep purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Essence

customer_reviews.title: Was given a used/ returned lotion, marketed as brand new! Dirty & seal missing. Cearly used!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I LOVE this! I bought another to keep at my bfs house, and it came USED! Cap was not clean and the protector that comes under the lid with all moisturizers was gone! WTF! Shady business practices. I'd be wary of buying these when they are on sale- they'll likely send you a returned/used product. I love cosRX but this vendor is not trustworthy :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily acne skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this cream! I've never used a snail mucin product before and wasn't sure what to expect since this cream is so popular. The texture is rather gel-like and sticky but it absorbs quickly on skin and doesn't dry sticky at all. It hasn't caused my acne to flare up and seems to make my face look less oily later in the day. Since it contains over 3 oz. of product this is a very good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Li

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Feel that I received a fake item. The package had extreme spelling errors, and the actual product smelled and had the exact consistency of Elmers white glue. Dried out my skin and left it tight and irritated. Better off buying in store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Soothes my skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from ulta which charges way too much than amazon prices, so when I ran out I got from amazon. It didn't really relieve of dry skin but instead made my skin look nice, slight sheen and calm which I only covered up in makeup! haha! I bought this again because it didn't break me out and somehow it seems to calm redness and any scarring of acne become less noticeable plus the benefits of the snail secretions....yes it sounds crazy but it's been good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what it does
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted to product for a long time because of all the raving reviews. Don't get me wrong, I like this product, and it feels good on my skin, but I can't say I'm too sure what it actually does for my skin. I've used about 1/4 of the tub so far (and yes, they do give a lot, but I feel like I need to use quite a bit to feel moisturized). I don't have any visible improvement of my skin but I don't see anything bad happening, so I guess that's a good thing...
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Product... Great! Packaging... No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The packaging however.... leaves more to be desired. There is an annoying little cap inside the lid that has a pull tab, but after a few uses (snail products are slimy and gooey) it’s impossible to use, but the lid alone is not enough to cover this product. I believe they make the same product in a pump which is definitely something I’m looking into. Overall, however, the product is great. Little to no scent, very good for sensitive skin, and does a great job hydrating (at least in the spring and summer months - I haven’t tried it through a winter yet).
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing but Not All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: I really like this "cream", however it is more of a hydrating gel. I definitely would not call this an "all-in-one" product, at least not for my dry skin. This is hydrating and very nice on my skin, but I need to make sure to use a heavier moisturizer on top of this unless I want the product to evaporate and leave my skin feeling tighter than before.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: It works - skin changes subtly -
customer_reviews.text: Not scented- not hydrating- but it WORKS! I can’t explain how, but after a week I noticed my face looked refreshed! Skin just looks better- I also use it as eye cream! After 30 minutes I use moisturizer for hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Dhol

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was at my wit's end with trying products for my skin, which is dehydrated/sensitive. This stuff works. It's moisturizing, soothing, and really keeps my skin calm. I mix it with my daily moisturizer. My texture has improved, which I'm very happy about. I also find that it helps my pimples go away more quickly. I put it on my body as well and it keeps me from breaking out as much. It did take a little while, maybe a week of consistent use for me to start seeing a difference, but it was so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: P.A

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fake?
customer_reviews.text: I used this with no real issue with my skin (no improvement either), but the top started to peel and chip little black pieces into the cream, making me wonder if this is a knockoff. I stopped using thereafter. What a waste
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Works well, virtually scentless, authentic cosrx
customer_reviews.text: I first was worried that this product was a fake, but I was able to confirm the typo on the label with the cosrx website, and the fact that this product works well has me SOLD. This lotion works well to keep me moisturized. It feels so sticky and thick on your hand, but rubs in to a very light weight moisturization. I love this product. The smell is virtually non-existent. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Denton

customer_reviews.title: My face loves snail mucus!
customer_reviews.text: People have commented to me how smooth and glowy my face looked after I started using this and I loved seeing their faces change when I told them the snail mucus was doing the trick. But don’t get it for the potential shock value, it really works. My skin vacillates between dry and oily and this stuff keeps it in check. I’m excited to see how it helps in the winter months, but so far, couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective , affordable. Texture wont be for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My skin is in love with this stuff, drinks it right up and has improved alot.funky texture(pretty much like snot) but you get used to it .just don't rub your hands together before trying to spread onto your face, slap directly on and it feels fine haha. I have sensitive skin and am acne prone so I was worried about the coconut but no problems .
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Unaffective product that irritated my face and dried me out
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received a bad or unauthentic product but I used it for a week and noticed no moisturizing properties... It actually gave my face a slight burning feeling and made it dry and flakey... I slowly took it out of my routine and noticed my skin balanced out again so this was definitely the culprit. I'm disappointed and don't see what everyone is raving about.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Glowy skin from a snail cream!
customer_reviews.text: I like how the cream makes my skin glowing and soft after use. Surprisingly, it is a lightweight cream for everyday use, gliding easily onto the skin. Great to use before putting on makeup once dried. I was skeptical about using snail creams due to the stickiness but now see that it's not at all sticky once dried. Highly recommend and would buy this product again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Thin moisturizer for humid climates
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lightweight moisturizer for oily skin or those living in a humid climate. I have dry skin and live in a dry climate so this moisturizer alone isn't enough to get me through the day. I haven't noticed any skintone evening affects personally.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this makes my skin feel. After application, my skin feels smooth with almost a velvety texture. I'm not sure about the rejuvenating properties that the listing says it had since I've only used it about 2 times, but in a month or two I'll update my review and say of I've seen any differences. However, this stuff smells AWFUL. I guess I shouldn't be expecting it to smell fresh or anything because 92% of the product is essentially mucus, but Christ, this stuff smells bad even for mucus. It wears off after a while but before that you'll need to hold your breath. Because of that, I'm taking off one star. Other than that, solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Buizelstar

customer_reviews.title: Works with my Combo/Oily skin(t zone extremely oily, cheeks normal)
customer_reviews.text: This has no scent or artificial dyes which is amazing for sensitive skin. At first I didn’t like how I felt with this moisturizer as it was slimy and heavy, BUT once it absorbs it leaves my skin feeling extremely soft. If you don’t like a heavy feeling moisturizer before absorption don’t buy this product. I use this with the thayers toner and vanicream face wash. Sometimes I implement rose water, but over all I don’t spend that much on my skin products and it works amazingly. One down side is the packaging. I transferred this into a bottle with a pump because I didn’t think it was sanitary to stick my hands in the tub it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Cindric

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: My skin is crazy picky, EVERYTHING makes it break out. This was the first moisturizer which didn't, after trying a half dozen. It feels very clean and natural on your face. I will continue using this till my dying day.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin and oily skin! Heals the skin an moisturizes wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This cream is amazing, my skin has never been happier. I've previously used COSRX's Snail 92 Mucin Power with great results (pimples cleared up quickly and previous pimple scars faded). This cream offers those healing benefits along with moisturizing properties. By itself this cream isn't enough for my dry skin type but combined with other products my skin is perfectly hydrated. The cream soaks in fairly quickly with no stickiness left behind only soft skin. My husband has oily skin with acne scars and this cream has also worked wonders for him with a significant reduction in scarring. Since he has oilier skin he can use this by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Just a big nope
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to have any lasting effects- other than making me break out! It definitely has a slime quality.
customer_reviews.author: campingirl

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: This cream is almost magical. The day I started to use it I had two active pimples, and in two days, they were completely healed and with minimum hyperpigmentation. I have been using this for a week, and I definitely feel and see a difference with my hyperpigmentation. The packaging is a little bit inconvenient. I would appreciate a tube instead of a jar. Other than that, I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Yelena Kirschman Siles

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't feel great on my skin and doesn't seem to do anything
customer_reviews.text: I honestly really dislike how slimy/sticky it feels when it's on my skin. Not super noticeable after a few hours or overnight, but I've stopped using it now because of that. Also, my skin didn't seem to change significantly one way or another when I was using it daily... 2 stars though since it is a lot of product for a very inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Bellamont

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product, reason being is it leaves your skin soft! I’ve bought this for the fourth time and I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: GIOVANNI

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight moisturizer for the spring and summer
customer_reviews.text: Unscented: perfect for those who are sensitive to fragrance Moisturizing but not enough for very dry skin, may be enough for normal to dry skin in the summer and spring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sadly allergic
customer_reviews.text: I am sadly one of the people allergic to our Lord and Savior Snail. I was really bummed out about that!
customer_reviews.author: belleteterouge

customer_reviews.title: Great product for its value!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sensitive skin and tried a lot of expensive moisturizers but so far this is the best creme i tried! I asked my mom & my wife to buy the same thing and they’re both satisfied with the results! When you wake up in the morning and touch your skin, you’ll feel its softness, and it makes your skin look younger and refreshed!
customer_reviews.author: kerby andres

customer_reviews.title: A must have all in ine cream
customer_reviews.text: Just love this product. I have a sensitive and combination skin. Recently started seeing so much of dullness as well. Saw visible differences in just 2 days after using this all in one cream. This adds life to dead skin and the dullness was gone. Skin felt soft and supple. Neither did it break me out nor dried up. Its not so creamy and heavy but just gets absorbed into the skin so easily. My guess is that it also works on pores. Happy to have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: saiss

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Love the way it made my skin feels. Helps with pimples and blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Daeng P

customer_reviews.title: it arrived open (((
customer_reviews.text: It arrived open... how can someone use a cream that was open and maybe even used. very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Keti Tsotniashvili

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail night time moisturizer. Thick, slippy consistency ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy Grail night time moisturizer. Thick, slippy consistency. Absorbs so well, makes my face plump when I wake up in the morning. No scent.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kris

customer_reviews.title: It was ok.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was disappointed. A friend recommended this cream and I had high hopes but my skin did not feel very moisturized from it and I guess the overall snail idea and stickiness was a bit off putting. It is lightweight and no scent that I noticed so that’s good. Not really any bad effects just not great ones either.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this even though I had seen some reviews saying it was fake, but I thought I would give it a shot. Definitely fake. I’ve used this product before, this will be my third one. Didn’t come with a spatula, the package coloring is off, and the smell is different. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Smooth from Snail Slime
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second jar of this cream. I don't know if it there are any long-term benefits for my mature skin, but for about 15 min after the cream is absorbed, my face and neck feel extremely soft and smooth. For this reason alone, I will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would moisturize my skin without making me breakout and this product has done it! I dab it lightly across my face once a day and it has worked wonders for my dry skin. I am a big advocate for Korean skin care and this is another product that I have added to my daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Reid

customer_reviews.title: Ultra moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: A little bit slime going on but very moisturizing and cooling. I have rosacea and it does ease the redness on my face. And in all good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is this product real or fake?
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t come with a spatula. I’ve seen other peoples reviews and my labeling looks different, so I’m not sure if this is real or fake. Also I did try it and it feels very slimy but when I put it on my face it feels very moist and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love the "snail stuff " !
customer_reviews.text: My daughter showed me this cream and encouraged me to try the "snail stuff ". I was skeptical at first, but was quickly surprised as to how wonderful this cream is! Skin feels moisturized and smooth. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: dale johnson

customer_reviews.title: Girl, Buy
customer_reviews.text: I *never* write reviews but this is honestly so good. I don’t find that it’s super moisturizing but If you layer an oil/moisturizer over this it makes the perfect base to lock in moisture and also makes my skin super smooth and glowy. Definitely can’t live without now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hydrated skin for the win!
customer_reviews.text: COSRX makes great products at a price point you don’t mind buying ! This snail cream goes on silky smooth and helps hydrate the skin. I haven’t noticed and additional benefits other than hydration in the long run, but it’s worth purchasing if you’re doing a Korean skin care routine!
customer_reviews.author: Jenniek41908

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and service
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery!! I was supposed to get the package on May 4 but it May 1. I love this cream, at first it was weird putting snail cream on, but once you get past that and realize that it has amazing results, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: April Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing and it feels awesome too. Also helps with scars. I have 4 family members including myself that use and love the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorica Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin baby smooth
customer_reviews.text: The consistency feels weird at first but once its dry on your face it feels fine. Makes your skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: It did nothing good for my skin in fact I woke up with ...
customer_reviews.text: This had very confusing results for me. It did nothing good for my skin in fact I woke up with some dry patches after use where I normally don't have them.
customer_reviews.author: Polina

customer_reviews.title: My skin feel so alive!!
customer_reviews.text: This product make my skin eel smoother and more sleek!!
customer_reviews.author: Merve F.

customer_reviews.title: Chin swelling with hives, burning my skin.
customer_reviews.text: There is something seriously wrong. My chin has swelled up with hives and my face is burning. I don’t have these reactions to skin care. I am also reading if it does not have a spatula it could possibly be counterfeit, I do not know if that is true though. I am having a very bad reaction to this, I would proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: The Pelican

customer_reviews.title: Twice a day everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Super healing and moisturizing. I use it every morning and night. Has helped tremendously with my acne and acne scars. I also put it on a burn on my hand from a hot oven (oops) and it helped heal it super quick! HOLY GRAIL. Keeps my face moisturized in midwest polar vortex.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Daniels

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is like liquid gold!
customer_reviews.text: I find myself using this all over because I love how luxurious it feels on my skin. Leaves my face, chest, arms just glistening and glowing - without oil or bronzer or sparkles! Just the healthiest glow.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha NYC

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the day, not so good for the night
customer_reviews.text: It leaves your skin very very soft but if you have dry skin, you'll probably feel like you need an extra layer of something on top of this. At night i sometimes have to heavily apply it so that it doesn't absorb fully just so i can feel like it's a moisturizer. I do like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: We think a fine new product line.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended my soni dear girlfriend who has very sensitive skin. We LOVE it; it's light and unscented and brilliant. We also live nature and bugs and snails and such, and none are harmed in the making of this product. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating but texture takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect a creamy, luxurious moisturizer. The consistency of the product is slimy and very wet when applied. It is hydrating and I did notice that my skin was bouncier and brighter after 2 weeks of nightly use. This is a good moisturizer for warm weather months or to use almost as a pre-moisturizer serum for double hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Solomom

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and soothing

product_meta.title: COSRX Advanced Snail 92 All in one Cream, 3.53 oz / 100g | Snail Secretion Filtrate 92% for Moisturizing
feature_bullets: Rich Gel-type Cream: This cream glides onto the skin, building a moisture barrier for long-lasting hydration.
Snail Secretion Filtrate 92%: Formulated with 92% snail mucin, this cream will moisturize, soothe, and leaving your skin plump and radiant with health.
Recommended for: Dry, dehydrated, and combination skin. Suitable for all skin types.
How to Use: Gently apply a proper amount of the cream to face, avoiding the eye and mouth area, after cleansing and toning.
Key Ingredient: Snail mucin helps repair and soothes red, sensitized skin after breakouts by replenishing moisture, and improves skin elasticity.
